item.title: Calendar of events
item.description:
Calendar of events

  • Wednesday July 22, 2015: Docker Detroit meetup
  • Thursday July 23, 2015, noon: a2b3 lunch, Madras Masala, Ann Arbor MI
  • Saturday and Sunday, Detroit Maker Faire, The Henry Ford, Dearborn MI

item.title: todo
item.description:
Todo

  • Auto-discovery for RSS feed, per http://gohugo.io/templates/rss/
  • Short codes for easy linking. First pass complete but no-op, next phase will do the markup too. I like the idea of assisted synaesthesia and colorized names and phrases. (Started, with colorized but not linked names)
  • Nicely thought through category and taxonomy pages. They have stubs now, but they need design.
  • A whole “Ann Arbor” section, because there’s so much of that, and it should integrate with Arborwiki. (Started.)
  • Links from books to their corresponding URLs and ISBNs to link to AADL and Amazon pages, perhaps with Librarything data
  • Pagination with group by date, coming in 0.15
  • Fix problem with dots in taxonomy names, coming in 0.15
  • Some kind of database driven page data, in preparation for rolling out a power outage maps collection based on DOE EIA data, cf http://gohugo.io/extras/datafiles/
  • Make sure that the theme is in version control, which means I have to learn about git subtrees.
